categorization_prompt:
Classify this email into ONE category from this list:
- meeting (meeting invitations, calendar requests)
- to-do (action required, tasks to complete)
- newsletter (subscriptions, marketing emails, product updates)
- spam (promotional, suspicious, unwanted)
- urgent (needs immediate attention, deadlines)
- announcement (company news, general updates)
- other (everything else)

Respond with ONLY the category word, nothing else.
auto_reply_prompt: Write a polite, concise and brief reply to this email.
